name: Legend of Empress
description:
The most legendary empress ever!
Aesthetic love in ancient China, gorgeous clothing, and cruel infighting in imperial harem. Drama happens everyday!
Love, Lies, and Reign. Forbidden love in harem, can you stay true to your heart after all the sufferings?

Unveil the mystery of oriental imperial harem.
Relive the life of legendary empress.
Experience the romance of ancient love.


Features
1)Mysterious Oriental Palace
Exploring the fascinating imperial harem. Delicate art design presents you a real believable oriental palace.

2)Immerse in the juicy Story
Falling in love with the emperor. Experiencing the legendary life about how a girl become to an empress.

3)Craft and collect traditional Chinese costumes
Hundreds of different costumes, hairstyles, makeups, headdresses, jewelry, accessories. Customize your style and winning in pageant.

4)Addictive harem infighting gameplay
Exclusive harem infighting interactions between players. Beat other concubines to win the harem throne.

5)Dive into royal relationships with real people
Get married with real people in game. Enjoy an ancient romantic love journey. Same sexual marriages are allowed.

6)Build love house with your sweetheart
Live with your sweetheart. Plant food, flowers and decorate your sweet home with your spouse (upcoming features). Experience a totally different life.

7)Real-time social with your friends
Make friends by joining in various in-game events. Assemble your friends in faction and win the clan war together.

PLEASE NOTE: Legend of Empress lets you purchase items within the game for real money. Please disable in-app purchases on your device if you do not want this feature to be accessible.

Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/legendofempress/
